lead_paragraph: Argentina’s new coach Edgardo Bauza has set his mind to wooing Lionel Messi back from international retirement as he ponders his squad for next month’s South American 2018 World Cup qualifiers.

headline.print_headline: New Coach Bauza Plans to Woo Messi Back for Argentina
headline.main: New Coach Bauza Plans to Woo Messi Back for Argentina

snippet: Argentina’s new coach Edgardo Bauza has set his mind to wooing Lionel Messi back from international retirement as he ponders his squad for next month’s South American 2018 World Cup qualifiers....
